message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm taking on the inflation risk.
I'll take a bit more since you're losing value each round.
The inflation is hitting me hard, Bob.  I need a better deal than that to make it worthwhile.
I know inflation is affecting you, but I'm not immune to getting a good deal. This is my best offer yet.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day.  Any more rounds and the inflation will eat up all the gains.
